Title: Why Your Bottom Will Thank You For Choosing Chamois Shorts
Body HTML:
üîç

Product Review

Why Your Bottom Will Thank You For Choosing Chamois Shorts

written by

Quin F.

Elevating Your Ride Comfort

Embarking on an uneven trail or a rigorous climb demands more than stamina; it necessitates optimal comfort and performance from every piece of gear. Enter PEARL iZUMi's Men's Expedition Shorts‚Äîthe embodiment of such requirements. Featuring the revolutionary ELITE Levitate chamois and Transfer fabric technology, these shorts are tailored for the avid adventurer seeking both resilience and finesse in their apparel.

‚úì

ELITE Levitate chamois

‚úì

High-stretch Transfer fabric

‚úì

Secure, high-rise waistband

‚úì

Leg silicone grippers

Supreme Support Meets Sleek Design

With the Men's Expedition Shorts, PEARL iZUMi has crafted a garment that speaks directly to the needs of the all-terrain cyclist. The high-stretch Transfer fabric acts as a second skin, granting riders unparalleled freedom of movement while efficiently wicking away moisture. The innovative ELITE Levitate chamois, celebrated for its dual-density suspension core, works to soften the vibrations and impacts of rugged paths. Moreover, thoughtful design touches, such as the high-rise waistband and silicone-printed leg grippers, ensure that the shorts remain securely yet comfortably positioned, no matter the intensity of the ride. For those who prize utility, the inclusion of three conveniently placed pockets means essentials are always within reach, negating the necessity for a traditional cycling jersey.

A game changer when I started riding longer and longer!

written by

Quin F.

Navigate Any Path with Unrivaled Comfort

PEARL iZUMi's Men's Expedition Shorts strike a fine balance between trail-ready robustness and everyday wearability. These shorts do not merely serve the cyclist‚Äîthey enhance the very experience of cycling, promising to become an indispensable companion for both the arduous journey and the leisurely jaunt. After all, it's not just about the destination; it's about how you feel every pedal of the way.

$75.00

Men's Expedition Shorts

Title: The Cyclist's Checklist: Accessories You Shouldn't Ride Without
Body HTML:
üèÜ

Top List

The Cyclist's Checklist: Accessories You Shouldn't Ride Without

Every cyclist knows the value of reliable gear, and when it comes to ensuring a comfortable and efficient ride, the devil is truly in the details. Our curated checklist features essential accessories for the discerning rider, from the Men's Quest Road Shoes, boasting an exceptional quality-price ratio, to the innovative comfort of the Men's Elite Gel Gloves. With the added protection of AmFIB¬Æ accessories against cold and wet conditions, PEARL iZUMi ensures every ride is unfettered by the elements.

Knowledge from

4 Experts

Elevate Your Ride with PEARL iZUMi Men's Elite Gel Gloves

Grasping Comfort: The Elite Gel Gloves Advantage

When cycling, the points of contact between cyclist and bike are critical for comfort and control, and that's where the Men's Elite Gel Gloves shine. Tailored with PEARL iZUMi's ingenuity, these gloves are equipped with 3D-shaped gel pads that target the zones where comfort is most needed, enhancing your grip without the extra bulk found in other gloves. As passionate riders ourselves, we know that every little detail counts, and the Ax Suede synthetic leather palm of these gloves offers the exceptional fit and durability that veteran cyclists value.

Not only does their design consider performance, but the microfiber thumb area is a thoughtful, ultra-soft detail for those perspiration moments that happen on intense rides. Plus, the convenience of the pull-off tabs cannot be overstated, allowing for effortless removal even after a long, sweaty journey. In the realm of safety, these gloves stand out with premium reflectivity for hand signaling, ensuring that visibility is never compromised, even on those adventurous night rides. The Men's Elite Gel Gloves are a testament to PEARL iZUMi's commitment to unparalleled versatility and cyclist-focused design, making them an indispensable addition to your cycling checklist.

However, some reviews have pointed out concerns over durability, an aspect to consider depending on your riding frequency and conditions. Compared to other models, such as the Men's Select Gloves, the Elite model is the pinnacle of comfort for high-performance enthusiasts. Featuring an ultra-light stretch fabric, these gloves are a perfect accessory for both the fervent road racer and the trail-blazing mountain biker looking for that refined control and comfort.

‚úì

3D-shaped gel padding

‚úì

Ax Suede synthetic leather

‚úì

Microfiber sweat wipe

‚úì

Pull-off tabs for ease

‚úì

Premium night-time reflectivity

Numb hands no more! Simple and effective.

written by

Quin F.

$20.00

Men's Elite Gel Gloves

The Perfect Harmony of Comfort and Performance

Elevate Your Ride with Men's Quest Road Shoes

Discover the quintessential accessory for your cycling endeavors‚Äîthe Men's Quest Road Shoes. Built for both the enthusiastic newcomer and the cost-conscious veteran, these shoes strike an ideal balance between high performance and value. If you're seeking a shoe that addresses your need for efficiency without skimping on comfort, you'll find solace in the sturdy, full nylon sole of the Men's Quest Road Shoes. These soles are expertly designed to facilitate a smoother pedal momentum and reduce the fatigue that long rides can impose on your feet.

Ventilation is also paramount in cycling shoes, and PEARL iZUMi doesn't disappoint with the Quest Road Shoes. The pairing of a heavily perforated film upper with breathable mesh ushers in a wave of fresh air, ensuring your feet stay cool, no matter the distance. When you're in the midst of a vigorous ride, the last thing you need is a disruption to adjust your shoes. Thanks to the three easily adjustable straps, a snug fit is always within reach, allowing you to focus on the road ahead. Moreover, the built-in 1cm rubber heel bumper contributes robustness to your stride when off the bike, compatible with both two-bolt and three-bolt cleats for a versatile use across different pedal systems.

This footwear champion is not merely functional; the Men's Quest Road Shoes are a nod to the stylish rider as well. Available in sleek BLACK/BLACK and the crisp WHITE/NAVY color variants, these shoes will effortlessly complement your cycling kit. PEARL iZUMi provides a range of sizes to ensure that every cyclist can find their perfect fit and enjoy the same level of comfort and performance. With the Quest Road Shoes, every journey, whether you're journeying across the city or challenging yourself with a spin class, becomes an opportunity to step up your cycling game.

‚úì

Reduces foot fatigue

‚úì

Optimal ventilation

‚úì

Adjustable on-the-fly

‚úì

Walkable rubber heel

A great way to get into clipless riding!

written by

Nicolas M.

$100.00

Men's Quest Road Shoes

The Ultimate Fusion of Comfort and Performance

Elevate Your Ride with Transfer Air 7" Socks

When it comes to cycling, every detail matters, including the choice of socks. The PEARL iZUMi Transfer Air 7" Sock is not just a covering for your feet‚Äîit's a meticulously designed accessory to enhance your riding experience. Created with an ultra-lightweight Transfer fabric, these socks are tailored for cyclists who demand both comfort and performance on the road. An olefin blend in the fabric ensures exceptional moisture management by swiftly transporting sweat away from your skin, keeping your feet dry through every stage of your ride.

But what sets the Transfer Air 7" Socks apart is their impeccable fit. The 360-degree tension band tightly hugs the arch, providing a seamless, nonslip fit that complements the snug environment of close-fitting cycling shoes. While the robust reinforcement at the heel and toe elevates their durability, the thoughtful venting on the top of the foot offers a cooling comfort, making them an ideal choice for summer sprints and hard rides.

In a variety of eye-catching color options and sizes, these socks strike the perfect balance between aesthetic appeal and functionality. Whether climbing steep hills or navigating city streets, your feet will thank you for the breathable, supportive embrace of the Transfer Air 7" Socks.

‚úì

Ultra-lightweight fabric

‚úì

Moisture-wicking olefin blend

‚úì

360-degree arch support

‚úì

Ventilated for breathability

Aero, comfy, and stylish! A color for every kit!

written by

Marion R.

$15.00

Transfer Air 7" Sock

The Ultimate Cold-Weather Cycling Comrade

Conquering Cold: The Role of AmFIB¬Æ Shoe Covers

As the mercury drops and the challenge of a bitter morning ride tempts the rugged cyclist, PEARL iZUMi's AmFIB¬Æ Shoe Covers stand as a testament to warmth and determination. These premium shoe covers are engineered for those who do not shy away from frosty gusts and drizzly skies. Clad in a three-layer AmFIB softshell fabric, these shoe covers provide a robust barrier against the elements, while the quilted lining fortified with 100g PrimaLoft Gold with Cross Core‚Ñ¢ technology ensures feet remain toasty within a cocoon of heat-retaining insulation.

Functionality and ease-of-use are paramount, as evidenced by the shoe covers‚Äô anatomical design, tailored to seamlessly integrate with the cyclist's natural pedal stroke‚Äîeliminating the distracting and uncomfortable bunching common with inferior products. To address concerns of visibility during low-light conditions, the shoe covers come equipped with strategically placed, highly-reflective BioViz¬Æ elements that command attention on the road. Moreover, the patented two-stage hook-and-loop closure grants the rider a frustration-free experience when it comes to slipping these covers on and off.

Not to overlook the dual nature of practicality and aesthetics, PEARL iZUMi presents these essentials in striking color ways, such as Screaming Yellow, ensuring that function never forgoes fashion. The AmFIB¬Æ Shoe Covers aren't just an accessory; they are a rider's stalwart companion on the cold-weather journey, merging unrivaled warmth, dryness, and visibility with the effortless grace of well-conceived design.

‚úì

Quilted PrimaLoft insulation

‚úì

DWR finish

‚úì

Reflective BioViz¬Æ elements

‚úì

Easy two-stage closure

A winter gravel ride must have, no more frozen brick toes!

written by

Matilda C.

$85.00

AmFIB¬Æ Shoe Covers

Your Essential Shield Against Chilly Winds

Brave the Breeze with AmFIB¬Æ Lite Headband

As a cyclist, you're no stranger to the challenges posed by changing weather conditions. When the mercury falls and the crisp air starts to tingle your ears, the PEARL iZUMi AmFIB¬Æ Lite Headband becomes an indispensable ally. Designed with the fall and mild winter rider in mind, the AmFIB¬Æ Lite Headband expertly combines Polartec¬Æ Wind Pro¬Æ fabric on the front to battle the biting wind, with a highly breathable thermal fabric on the back to manage your body's microclimate while pushing the limits.

Comfort is key during long rides, and the headband's snug fit under your helmet ensures it stays put without bunching, enhancing your focus on the road ahead. Moreover, PEARL iZUMi has thoughtfully included a port for ponytails, embracing both practicality and style. With variants in classic black, it complements any cycling wardrobe seamlessly, making the AmFIB¬Æ Lite Headband not just a practical piece of gear but also a stylish one.

When temperatures begin to dip, don‚Äôt let the thought of cold ears deter you from enjoying your passion. Embrace the cold with confidence knowing that the AmFIB¬Æ Lite Headband by PEARL iZUMi is as dedicated to your comfort and performance as you are to your cycling.

‚úì

Polartec¬Æ Wind Pro¬Æ

‚úì

Breathable thermal back

‚úì

Helmet-compatible fit

‚úì

Ponytail port

Fits under my helmet and keeps the chill off while still letting my head breathe!

written by

Quin F.

$25.00

AmFIB¬Æ Lite Headband

Title: Frequently Asked Questions
Body HTML:
Here are a few of our most commonly asked questions. If you don‚Äôt see your question addressed below, please reach out to our team and we‚Äôll get back to you as soon as possible. You can reach us at 800-328-8488 or info@pearlizumi.com.

[quick-links links="Shipping Information,shipping_information:Returns & Exchanges,returns:60-Day Fit Guarantee,60_day_fit:Warranties,warranties:Crash Replacement,crash_replacement:Locating Stores,locating_stores:Payment and Checkout Errors,payment_errors:International Orders,international_orders:Sponsorship,sponsorship"]

Shipping Information


[accordion heading="Who do you use for shipping?" content="We utilize FedEx for all our shipping as of February 3, 2025. If you placed an order before that date, your order may be delivered by another carrier."][accordion heading="How long does it take my order to ship?" content="We try to ensure all orders are packed and shipped within 1-2 business days, pending merchandise availability. Orders placed on weekends or holidays will be processed on the next business day. Business days are Monday through Friday (excluding holidays). Note: We may become backlogged during sale events and holidays, which could increase the order processing time."] [accordion heading="Where will my order ship from?" content="Our distribution center is located in Southern California and all orders will ship from this location."][accordion heading="I didn't receive all of my items. Are they coming in a later shipment?" content="There is a small chance that the missing item(s) you ordered were out of stock when you order was being fulfilled. Please contact customer service at info@pearlizumi.com for assistance with additional questions."] [accordion heading="I entered the wrong shipping address. Can you update it?" content="Once an order has been placed we are unable to modify the address in any way."] [accordion heading="Do you ship to PO Boxes or APO addresses?" content="FedEx Ground Economy and FedEx Ground Economy (Pro) will deliver to PO Boxes and APO/FPO/DPO addresses. We cannot deliver to PO Boxes or APO/FPO/DPO addresses with FedEx 2-Day Air or FedEx Standard Overnight shipping methods."]

Returns & Exchanges

Products marked FINAL SALE are not eligible to be returned or exchanged.

Please allow up to 30 business days for your exchange to be processed. If you receive defective or incorrect items, please contact us at info@pearlizumi.com or 800-328-8488, prior to sending these items back.

New and unused merchandise may be returned with the original tags attached up to 60 days from the date of purchase for a refund or exchange. A credit will be issued to the original credit card for the item(s) amount, less shipping and handling.

‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Please do not combine returns in one package. Each return label is uniquely linked to a specific item, and only the item associated with that label will be processed. Combining items may result in delays or unprocessed returns.

[button title="Initiate Return" type="default" link="https://returns.pearlizumi.com/#/"]
[accordion heading="The return form says I need to include my packing slip, but I can't find it." content="Our packing slips are either in a plastic envelope on the outside of the box, or under the shipping label. If yours was under the shipping label and you cut it in half, please submit the part with your order number and item. If you have thrown away your packing list please print a copy of your order confirmation email and include that with your return."][accordion heading="I cut the hang tags off the garment, can I still return it?" content="If you have only removed the hang tags, then yes, you can still return the new and unused item. However, you will need to include the hangtags with your return so we can reattach them at the warehouse. Unfortunately, if you have also removed the sewn in white product care tags, we will be unable to accept the return."][accordion heading="I need to return something, but my credit card number has changed since I made my order, can I still get my refund?" content="If you received a new credit card number from the same issuing bank, it will not be a problem to refund your credit card. Just like all pending payment transactions carry forward onto your new card, so will your refunds.

However, if you closed the account with that issuing bank and opened a new credit card with a different bank, please contact us at info@pearlizumi.com before sending back your return."][accordion heading="I received my return email confirmation, but I don't see my refund on my statement. Are you sure it went through?" content="Most banks take 3-6 business days for the refunded amount to reflect in your available balance. While 3-6 business days is standard, some banks can take much longer. If you use multiple cards for your online transactions, please be sure you are checking the correct account. If you used PayPal to checkout, your refund will go back to your PayPal account. You then have the option to use that amount for any future payment via PayPal or you may transfer it to your bank account."]

Returns

  • PEARL iZUMi reserves the right to refuse any items deemed to be in an unsanitary or unsafe condition.
  • FINAL SALE¬†items are not¬†eligible for return.
  • New and unused merchandise may be returned with the original tags attached, up to 60 days from the fulfillment date, for a refund.
  • Please return item(s) in the original packaging.
  • Returns will be refunded to the original card used to purchase the item(s).
  • The online return process will require a printer, as you are provided a PDF that includes a shipping label and return document. If you do not have a printer, a local office supply store or library may be able to assist in printing.
  • Return authorization is not necessary, and we do not issue RA numbers for consumer returns.
  • Returns and exchanges are only accepted for products purchased directly through www.pearlizumi.com. If you purchased from a retail partner or another source, then please complete your return or exchange with them.

Exchanges

  • PEARL iZUMi reserves the right to refuse any items deemed to be in an unsanitary or unsafe condition.
  • FINAL SALE items are not eligible for an exchange.
  • If the exchanged item is no longer available for us to fulfill, the original card used to purchase will be automatically refunded for the order (excludes shipping).
  • RETURNING AN EXCHANGED ITEM: While our automated system only allows for an item to be returned or exchanged one time, we are happy to help set up a return for this item. Please email info@pearlizumi.com with "EXCHANGE RETURN" and our customer support team will be happy to assist.
  • New and unused merchandise may be exchanged for the same item, in a new color or size, with the original tags attached.
  • New items will ship once returned items have been received and processed.
  • Exchanges will be accepted up to 60 days from the date of fulfillment.
  • Please return item(s) in the original packaging, if possible.
  • The online exchange process will require a printer, as you are provided a PDF includes a shipping label and return document. If you do not have access to a printer,¬†feel free to visit your local UPS store.


PEARLiZUMi.com 60-Day Fit Guarantee

[accordion heading="What does the 60-day fit guarantee cover?" content="If you are dissatisfied with the fit of your new PEARL iZUMi gear, regardless of usage, the product may be refunded within 60 days of purchase at PEARLiZUMi.com. Items will be refunded not exchanged. FINAL SALE items are not eligible for the 60 Day Fit."] [accordion heading="Is my FINAL SALE item eligible for the 60 Day Fit Guarantee?" content="60 Day Fit Guarantee does not cover FINAL SALE items for a return or exchange."] [accordion heading="Does my PEARLiZUMi.com purchase qualify for a 60-day fit guarantee?" content="To qualify, you must present the original PEARLiZUMi.com order number and mail the product back to PEARL iZUMi. FINAL SALE items are not eligible for a 60 day fit guarantee. Refunds will be credited to the payment form used to make the original purchase. You have 60 days from the date of purchase to utilize the 60-Day Fit Guarantee."] [accordion heading="What is the process to file a PEARLiZUMi.com 60-day fit guarantee?" content="Please reach out to customer service at info@pearlizumi.com to initiate the 60-Day Fit Guarantee. "] [accordion heading="How long should I expect for my PEARLiZUMi.com 60-day fit guarantee refund to process?" content="Email notification is sent upon receiving¬†your return, please allow 10-14 business days¬†for the credit to be reflected on your original form of payment after you receive your email notification."] [accordion heading="What if I purchased my product outside of PEARLiZUMi.com?" content="Please contact the authorized retailer you purchased the item from."]

Limited Lifetime Warranty

PEARL iZUMi reserves the right to refuse any items deemed to be in an unsanitary or unsafe condition. Warranty Claims can take up to 30 days to be processed. Please note we cannot make any claims via email.


[accordion heading="Does my product qualify for the limited lifetime warranty?"content="PEARL iZUMi product purchased from PEARL iZUMi or an authorized seller is warranted to the original owner against factory defects in materials and workmanship for the lifetime of the product, which is defined as five (5) years. If a product fails due to a manufacturing or materials defect, then PEARL iZUMi will replace the product or otherwise make it right.

This limited warranty does not include product failures resulting from accidents, misuse, improper care, chlorinated pools, crash damage, general damage, alterations, modifications or normal wear and tear.

Any alteration of PEARL iZUMi brand products will void warranty coverage.

Because PEARL iZUMi cannot control the quality of products sold by unauthorized sellers, this warranty applies only to products that were purchased from PEARL iZUMi or a PEARL iZUMi authorized seller in the United States, unless otherwise prohibited by law. PEARL iZUMi reserves the right to reject warranty claims for products purchased from unauthorized sellers, including unauthorized Internet sites or marketplace storefronts."] [accordion heading="How do I start a warranty claim?"content="Purchasers of products who wish to make a warranty claim based upon a product defect should contact PEARL iZUMi at info@pearlizumi.com. Ensure the following are provided at time of contact:
1. images of the defect;
2. a brief description of the defect;
3. confirmation of the product style (usually printed inside the garment);
4. product size and color;
5. proof of purchase;
6. your full name and address.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our customer service team at 800-328-8488.


Replacements are dependent on available inventory.


"] [accordion heading="Do you process warranty claims from outside of the United States?"content="We cannot accept warranty claims from outside of the United States.

REPLACEMENTS AS PROVIDED UNDER THIS WARRANTY ARE THE EXCLUSIVE REMEDY OF THE CONSUMER. PEARL iZUMi SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES FOR BREACH OF ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTY ON THIS PRODUCT. Some States do not allow the exclusion or limitation of incidental or consequential damages, so the above limitation or exclusion may not apply to you. Any implied warranties that may be applicable to products, including implied warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose, are limited in duration to the duration of this warranty. Some States do not allow limitations on how long an implied warranty lasts, so the above limitation may not apply to you.

This warranty gives you specific legal rights, and you may also have other rights which vary from State to State."]

Crash Replacement

[accordion heading="What does the PEARLiZUMi.com Replacement Program cover?" content="It‚Äôs not fun, but crashes happen - on the road, on the trail, riding to work. But don‚Äôt worry, we‚Äôve got your back. PEARLiZUMi.com is happy to offer you 30% off of a new replacement product when you endo and wreck your PEARL iZUMi gear. Sorry, normal wear and tear does not qualify here."] [accordion heading="What product does the crash replacement program apply to?" content="Any PEARL iZUMi gear that‚Äôs been severely damaged in a crash. It‚Äôs that simple. Please note, normal wear and tear does not qualify here."] [accordion heading="How do I file a crash replacement claim on PEARLiZUMi.com?" content="To make a claim, email info@pearlizumi.com with the subject line Crash Replacement. Then include the following:

Full name
Address
Item description
Quantity of PEARL iZUMi items wrecked
Any details you deem relevant
Photo(s) which shows the damage to your PEARL iZUMi apparel not of your crash. Your photos will not be used or published without your express permission.

Once received, a Customer Service representative will reach out, and encourage you to get back on your bike with a 30% off MSRP 1-time use discount code. The code will be valid for a one time purchase and redeemable at PEARLiZUMi.com."] [accordion heading="What are the details of the PEARLiZUMi.com Discount?" content="Your discount code for 30% off MSRP on PEARLiZUMi.com. It is only valid for purchases on PEARLiZUMi.com. Your discount is good for one-time purchase.

Locating Stores

[button title="Store Locator" type="default" link="https://www.pearlizumi.com/pages/store-locator"]
[accordion heading="Where can I find a store that carries PEARL iZUMi?"content="Please refer to our store locator (click button above) to find an authorized PEARL iZUMi retailer near you."]

Payment and Checkout Errors

[accordion heading="I am getting an address error while checking out." content="All billing addresses must be in the US. The billing address you enter must match the address your bank has on file; we send this information to your bank for verification, and we cannot override their response if it does not match. If you feel you are entering your address correctly, please call the 1-800 number on the back of your card, ask for either the Fraud or Authorizations Department and have them verify what your address is on file. If you have more than one address on file (most common with PO Boxes and after moving to a new home) one of those addresses will likely need to be deleted from the bank‚Äôs system. Please use the exact address they provide for your billing address."] [accordion heading="I see a charge on my credit card, but didn't get an order confirmation." content="Please email us at info@pearlizumi.com and we can provide your order number for you."] [accordion heading="I would like to use a Visa, AMEX, Mastercard gift card, but the site will¬†not accept it." content="We are currently unable to accept gift cards as a form of payment on PEARLiZUMi.com at this time."]

International Orders

[accordion heading="Do you ship internationally?" content="Unfortunately we do not ship to international addresses. Our site does not accept international cards and we are unable to accommodate each country‚Äôs customs and duties requirements."] [accordion heading="What about Canada?" content="We do ship to Canada and orders can be placed on our Canadian website (www.pearlizumi.ca)."]

Sponsorship

[accordion heading="I'm really fast, will you sponsor me?" content="We accept sponsorship applications between September 1st and October 31st for the following year. Proposals must be received in writing at our physical address in order to be considered, no phone calls or emails will be accepted."]

Other Questions?

Please email us at info@pearlizumi.com for all other questions.

Last updated: 08.22.25

@layer reset{

      /* breakpoints */
@media (min-width: 640px) {
  :host::part(page-container) {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 36rem;
    padding-left: 0;
    padding-right: 0;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  :host::part(page-container) {
    max-width: 100%;
    padding-left: 52px;
    padding-right: 52px;
    gap: 48px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1280px) {
  :host::part(page-container) {
    max-width: 1200px;
    padding-left: 0;
    padding-right: 0;
  }
}

/* top offset for table of contents */
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
    :host .pos_sticky {
        top: 80px;
    }
}

/* custom styles for buy now button */
:host::part(product-purchase-button) {
    height: 3rem;
    width: 175px;
    background: #161718;
    border-radius: 50px;
	text-transform: uppercase;
    line-height: 100%;
    transition-property: opacity;
    transition-duration: 0.3s;
    transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}

:host::part(product-purchase-button):hover {
    opacity: .9;
}

/* custom styles for chat activator button */
:host::part(product-chat-activator) {
    height: 3rem;
    width: 225px;
    justify-content: center;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    color: #161718;
    border-color: #161718;
    border-width: 2px;
    border-radius: 50px;
	text-transform: uppercase;
    line-height: 100%;
    transition-property: color, background;
    transition-duration: 0.3s;
    transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}

:host::part(product-chat-activator):hover {
    background: #161718;
    color: #FFFFFF;
}

<p class="lh_18px fw_600 fs_medium ff_fontFamily c_contentDefault filter_blur(0px) trs_filter_0.22s will-change_transform loading:filter_blur(token(blurs.loadingText))" part="title-author-name">Matilda Colvin</p>
<div class="d_flex gap_xsmall"><p class="ff_fontFamily fs_small c_contentSubtle lh_16px fw_400 ls_-0.1px filter_blur(0px) trs_filter_0.22s will-change_transform">PEARL iZUMi Expert</p></div>
</div>
<p class="fs_small c_contentSubtle ff_fontFamily fw_400 lh_130% ls_-0.1px lc_2" part="title-author-bio">Hey, I'm Matilda, an adventure photographer based in Bozeman, MT! As a former college competitive alpine skier, I've always been drawn to the thrill of high-speed descents and pristine mountain landscapes. After hanging up my racing skis, I picked up a camera and bike, discovering new ways to express my love for the outdoors.

Now, as a photographer based in Bozeman, I strive to inspire others to appreciate and protect the wilderness that surrounds us!</p>
</div>
</div></div>
</div></div>
<p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">As an avid cyclist and outdoor enthusiast, I've learned that the right gear can make all the difference when it comes to enjoying rides in less-than-ideal weather conditions. Whether you're a dedicated road cyclist, a mountain biker, or a daily commuter, having the proper rain gear is essential for staying dry, comfortable, and safe on your bike. In this article, I'll share my top picks for the best cycling rain gear to keep you pedaling through those wet days.</p>
<h2 xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" id="womens-summit-amfib-lite-pants-your-go-to-for-winter-rides" class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamilyHeadings fw_700 fs_h2 scr-mt_100px [@container_remarkPageContainer_(max-width:_950px)]:fs_h3 lh_120% wb_break-word mt_xlarge mb_small" part="heading">Women's Summit AmFIB¬Æ Lite Pants: Your Go-To for Winter Rides</h2>

<h3 class="fs_h3 fw_700 lh_120%" part="product-name">Women's Summit AmFIB¬Æ Lite Pants</h3>
<div class="d_flex flex-wrap_wrap flex-d_row gap_default">
<a data-remark-id="purchase-button" remark-product-id="294d753c-1dc8-4117-af5a-2aa39ee2edea" href="https://www.pearlizumi.com/products/womens-summit-amfib-lite-pants-19232204" class="d_flex ai_center jc_center flex-d_row gap_xsmall p_small bdr_default bg_primaryDefault c_contentInverted fs_medium fw_500 cursor_pointer" part="product-purchase-button"><span data-remark-id="product-price" remark-product-id="294d753c-1dc8-4117-af5a-2aa39ee2edea">$175.00</span><span>¬∑</span><span>Buy now</span></a><button data-remark-id="chat-activator" data-remark-product-name="Women's Summit AmFIB¬Æ Lite Pants" data-remark-activator-text="What are some alternatives?" class="d_flex ai_center flex-d_row gap_xsmall p_small bdr_default bg_bgPrimary bd_1px_solid bd-c_primarySubtle c_primaryDefault fs_medium fw_500 cursor_pointer" part="product-chat-activator">Ask for an alternative</button>

<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">When the temperatures drop and the skies threaten rain or snow, you need pants that can handle it all. The Women's Summit AmFIB¬Æ Lite Pants from PEARL iZUMi are my top choice for cold-weather riding. These mountain bike pants offer the perfect balance of protection and breathability, making them ideal for those chilly, damp days on the trail.</p>

<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">The lightweight softshell fabric provides excellent wind and water protection, while the soft brushed backing adds just the right amount of warmth. What really sets these pants apart is the PI Dry¬Æ technology, which adds water-shedding performance to keep you dry when splashing through puddles or kicking up snow.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">I particularly appreciate the Trail Access pockets, strategically placed behind your legs for comfortable storage of essentials like your phone or energy bars. This thoughtful design ensures that your gear stays accessible without interfering with your pedaling motion.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">For those extra cold days, you can layer these pants over your favorite liner shorts or cycling tights for additional warmth. It's this versatility that makes the Summit AmFIB¬Æ Lite Pants a staple in my cycling wardrobe.</p>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="15" height="15" viewbox="0 0 15 15" fill="none" class="min-w_15px"><g clip-path="url(#clip0_7378_14443)"><path d="M5.16797 7.49935H9.83464M13.3346 7.49935C13.3346 10.721 10.723 13.3327 7.5013 13.3327C4.27964 13.3327 1.66797 10.721 1.66797 7.49935C1.66797 4.27769 4.27964 1.66602 7.5013 1.66602C10.723 1.66602 13.3346 4.27769 13.3346 7.49935Z" stroke="var(--remark-colors-content-error)" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></g><defs><clippath id="clip0_7378_14443"><rect width="14" height="14" fill="var(--remark-colors-bg-default)" transform="translate(0.5 0.5)"></rect></clippath></defs></svg><p class="c_contentDefault fs_14px fw_400 lh_120% ff_fontFamily">Layering on race day </p>
</div></div>
</div></div>
</div></div>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">The jacket's 3L WxB Membrane technology, combined with taped seams and a DWR finish, creates a near impenetrable barrier against rain while maintaining breathability. <span>This combination of waterproofness and breathability is crucial for comfortable riding in wet conditions, ensuring you stay dry from both the rain outside and your own perspiration inside.</span></p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">One of my favorite features is the articulated arms, which provide an excellent on-bike fit. The long drop tail is another thoughtful addition, shielding your backside from road spray ‚Äì a small detail that makes a big difference on wet rides.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">The two-way zipper is a standout feature, allowing for easy temperature regulation during long climbs. When the rain lets up, the packable design means you can easily stow the jacket in a jersey pocket, ready for the next shower.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">I've found the Attack WxB Jacket to be my go-to for those days when the forecast looks grim. Its combination of protection, breathability, and smart design features make it an essential piece of gear for any serious cyclist facing wet conditions.</p>
</div>

</div>

</div></div>
</div></div>
</div></div>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">The 2.5L WxB membrane technology and fully taped seams ensure that you stay dry even in heavy downpours. <span>When it comes to cycling in the rain, having the right bib tights can make all the difference in keeping you warm, dry, and comfortable throughout your ride.</span> While these aren't bib tights, they offer similar benefits with added versatility.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">One of the standout features of these pants is the powerful BioViz¬Æ reflectivity. <span>Whether you're commuting, road cycling, or tackling gravel and mountain trails, preparing for wet weather with the right apparel and accessories can make a huge difference in your ride.</span> The reflective elements on the hips and along the full-length leg zipper ensure visibility up to 100 meters, significantly enhancing your safety during low-light conditions.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">I particularly appreciate the extended leg zipper that reaches below the knee, making it easy to slip these pants on over shoes. The modern design with an elastic waistband and hidden lace closure adds both style and functionality.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">Whether you're gearing up for a cycling tour or planning a trip to a rainy destination, these pants are a reliable choice that won't let the weather dampen your plans.</p>
</div>

</div>

<div class="bdr_default flex_1 p_large bd_token(borders.default)_token(colors.borderError)" part="cons-container"><div part="pros-and-cons-list">
<p class="ff_fontFamily fs_12px fw_600 lh_130% c_contentMuted mb_default">AVOID FOR</p>
<div class="d_flex flex-d_column gap_small"><div class="d_flex gap_8px" part="pros-and-cons-list-item">
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="15" height="15" viewbox="0 0 15 15" fill="none" class="min-w_15px"><g clip-path="url(#clip0_7378_14443)"><path d="M5.16797 7.49935H9.83464M13.3346 7.49935C13.3346 10.721 10.723 13.3327 7.5013 13.3327C4.27964 13.3327 1.66797 10.721 1.66797 7.49935C1.66797 4.27769 4.27964 1.66602 7.5013 1.66602C10.723 1.66602 13.3346 4.27769 13.3346 7.49935Z" stroke="var(--remark-colors-content-error)" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></g><defs><clippath id="clip0_7378_14443"><rect width="14" height="14" fill="var(--remark-colors-bg-default)" transform="translate(0.5 0.5)"></rect></clippath></defs></svg><p class="c_contentDefault fs_14px fw_400 lh_120% ff_fontFamily">More budget-conscious cyclists</p>
</div></div>
</div></div>
</div></div>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">The lightweight, waterproof fabric used in this jacket is a technological marvel. It offers unbeatable protection against rain and wind while remaining highly breathable, preventing overheating during intense rides. <span>The temperatures you ride in are also a consideration: If you're looking for a raincoat that you can wear in the winter, you'll want one that can fit a cycling jacket or at least a base layer and long-sleeve jersey underneath it while still allowing you to breathe comfortably.</span> The PRO Rain Jacket meets this requirement perfectly.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">One of the standout features is the fully taped seams, which provide an extra layer of protection against water ingress. The helmet-compatible hood is another thoughtful addition, ensuring complete coverage without compromising your visibility or safety.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">I'm particularly impressed with the streamlined fit of this jacket. It's designed to reduce drag, enhancing your performance as you ride through wet conditions. This attention to aerodynamics sets the PRO Rain Jacket apart from many other rain jackets on the market.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">In my experience, the Women's PRO Rain Jacket is the epitome of high-performance rain gear. It's the jacket I reach for when I know I'll be facing challenging weather conditions but still want to push my limits on the bike.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">Whether you're commuting through a downpour or tackling a long-distance ride in unpredictable weather, this jacket ensures that the elements won't hold you back. It's built to help you push boundaries and make every mile count, regardless of what Mother Nature throws your way.</p>
</div>
<remark-qa-activator external-id="8226555887787" vendor-id="79a1ae15-8e03-475d-a849-77f236050b1c"></remark-qa-activator>
</div>

<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">When it comes to versatile protection against the elements, the Women's Quest Barrier Jacket is a standout choice. This lightweight cycling wind jacket is perfect for those rides where the weather can be unpredictable, offering just the right amount of protection without weighing you down.</p>

<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">The durable water-repellent finish is a key feature of this jacket, effectively blocking windchill and shedding light precipitation. <span>When it comes to cycling in the rain, having the right gear can make all the difference in keeping you warm, dry, and comfortable throughout your ride.</span> While it may not be fully waterproof like some of the other options we've discussed, it's perfect for those days when there's a chance of light showers or when you need protection from cool winds.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">One of the aspects I appreciate most about this jacket is its relaxed fit and extended sizing up to 3XL. This makes it incredibly easy to layer over whatever you're wearing, whether that's a light base layer or a thicker jersey for cooler days. The versatility in fit ensures that you can adapt to changing weather conditions throughout your ride.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph"><span>Some suitable options include the Women's Quest Barrier Jacket, the Women's Summit Barrier Jacket, and the Women's Quest AmFIB¬Æ Jacket. All of these jackets are windproof and have a water repellent exterior.</span> The Quest Barrier Jacket, in particular, stands out for its balance of protection and breathability, making it ideal for a wide range of temperatures and weather conditions.</p>
<p class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">For cyclists who value versatility and comfort, the Quest Barrier Jacket is an excellent choice. It's the kind of jacket you'll find yourself reaching for time and time again, whether you're heading out for a quick training ride or embarking on a longer adventure.</p>
</div>
<remark-qa-activator external-id="6950607093931" vendor-id="79a1ae15-8e03-475d-a849-77f236050b1c"></remark-qa-activator>
</div>
<h2 xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" id="conclusion-gear-up-for-any-weather" class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamilyHeadings fw_700 fs_h2 scr-mt_100px [@container_remarkPageContainer_(max-width:_950px)]:fs_h3 lh_120% wb_break-word mt_xlarge mb_small" part="heading">Conclusion: Gear Up for Any Weather</h2>
<p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">As cyclists, we know that the right gear can make or break a ride, especially when it comes to wet weather. The products we've explored today ‚Äì from the versatile Summit AmFIB¬Æ Lite Pants to the high-performance PRO Rain Jacket ‚Äì represent some of the best options available for staying dry and comfortable on your bike.</p>
<p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">Remember, the key to enjoying cycling in all weather conditions is being prepared. Investing in quality rain gear not only keeps you comfortable but also extends your riding season and opens up new adventures. Whether you're commuting to work, training for a race, or exploring new trails, these PEARL iZUMi products will help ensure that a little rain never stops you from answering the call of the road or trail.</p>
<p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" class="c_contentDefault ff_fontFamily my_default fs_default fw_400 lh_150% wb_break-word" part="paragraph">So gear up, embrace the elements, and keep pedaling ‚Äì because with the right rain gear, every ride can be a great one, no matter what the weather brings.</p>
</div></div>
</div>
</div></div></template>

Title: Affiliate Program
Metafield: title_tag [string]: Join the PEARL iZUMi Affiliate Program | PEARL iZUMi
Metafield: description_tag [string]: Partner with PEARL iZUMi through our Affiliate Program. Earn commissions while promoting premium cycling gear designed for performance and sustainability.

Title: Pro Membership Benefits
Body HTML:
The PEARL iZUMi Pro Program

We‚Äôre a community of cycling enthusiasts, united by the common goal of helping more people go by bike. Our Pro Program is open to select professionals directly involved with creating more riders, and more places to ride.

Q: What is the PEARL iZUMi Pro Program?

A: The PEARL iZUMi Pro Program offers generous merchandise discounts to select qualified cycling and outdoor professionals. In exchange for an exclusive discount and early access to new releases, we value Pros who help further our advocacy mission, share their cycling experience with family and friends, tag @pearlizumiofficial and #ridemoredomore on Instagram, and leave product reviews.

Q: Who is eligible?

A: Pro Program membership is approved on a case-by-case basis. We invite professional cyclists, individuals who are employed full-time directly in the cycling or related outdoor industry, first responders and military personnel to apply. Current valid proof of employment is required.

Q: How to apply?

A: Please follow the steps below.

1. Please start by creating a standard (non-Pro) account HERE. Follow the instructions to activate your account. If you already have a PEARL iZUMi account, skip ahead to the next step.

2. Fill out your Pro application HERE. Please make sure to provide your proof of current employment, relevant certifications, athletic resume, or any other documentation PEARL iZUMi should consider for approval.

3. Thanks for your application! It will take 3-5 business days to be reviewed. You will be emailed as soon as we process your application.

Pro Program Rules

If accepted, remember that this discount is for you and you alone, and this will be strictly enforced. We ask that you also respect the following rules around the PEARL iZUMi Pro Program:

  • Do not purchase products for friends, family, or anyone else in your household. This is strictly monitored and if we find any abuse, your account and discount will be terminated.
  • Never visit a PEARL iZUMi retail partner to try product on or to conduct returns or exchanges. Instead, we welcome you to use your Pro Program discount online, or directly at our PEARL iZUMi Factory Stores. Find a store HERE.
  • Warranty & Returns: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase, but if something isn‚Äôt right, let us know and we will work with you to make it right. Learn more HERE.
  • Sales may not be combined with any other offers or discounts. Discounts cannot be applied retroactively.
  • PEARL iZUMi grants non-transferable benefits. You must keep your account information confidential! PEARL iZUMi assumes no liability for fraudulent use of your account by third parties.

If you have any questions, please email us: pearlizumipro@pearlizumi.com.

Apply Now

Title: Chamois Guide
Body HTML:
CHAMOIS TECHNOLOGY

WHEN IT COMES TO CHAMOIS WE ARE THE EXPERTS

CHAMOIS TECHNOLOGY

WHEN IT COMES
TO CHAMOIS WE ARE THE EXPERTS

FOR 40 YEARS WE HAVE SET THE BENCHMARK FOR COMFORT IN THE SADDLE.¬†

A chamois, pronounced SHAM-MEE, is a padded insert sewn into cycling shorts or bibs, enhancing comfort and reducing friction between the cyclist and the saddle. It absorbs vibrations and shocks from the road or trail, protects sensitive areas from pressure points, and prevents chafing during long rides.

In 1983, PEARL iZUMi pioneered the first synthetic chamois, revolutionizing cycling apparel. We‚Äôre committed to ongoing innovation in chamois technology, ensuring top-notch performance for riders at all price points, because everyone deserves comfortable rides.

DISCOVER OUR RANGE OF CHAMOIS

ANATOMY OF A CHAMOIS

ANATOMY OF A CHAMOIS

The combination of a multi-density Suspension Core, super-soft Boundary Layer top sheet, and seamless Infinite Edge transition allows the rider to float through road and trail chatter so you'll never bottom out.

RELIEF CHANNEL

MORE SUPPORT

The Dynamic Relief Channel reduces centerline pressure and holds its pressure-relieving shape no matter how the chamois bends and flexes under the rider.

SUSPENSION CORE

MORE CUSHION

The Suspension Core supports your body weight while pedaling, and cushions even when the load is increased up to 4x. ¬†

BOUNDARY LAYER

LESS FRICTION

The Boundary Layer moves with you and quickly wicks moisture off your skin to keep you dry and minimize friction.

INFINITE EDGE

LESS BULK

The Infinite Edge smoothly tapers to blend seamlessly to prevent chafing and reduce bulk.

RELIEF CHANNEL

MORE SUPPORT

DISCOVER OUR LEVITATE CHAMOIS FAMILY

DISCOVER OUR LEVITATE CHAMOIS FAMILY

The Levitate family represents our latest innovations in chamois technology. Designed to enhance comfort and performance for every type of rider.

PRO Levitate

THE PINNACLE OF COMFORT AND PERFORMANCE

PRO Levitate

The pinnacle of comfort and performance, this chamois offers more support with better stretch and breathability than anything else on the market.

‚Ä¢ PRO Next-Gen Suspension Core¬Æ utilizes ultra high-density and medium-density layers to distribute your body weight over a larger area for more comfort

‚Ä¢ Offers superior riding experience for long hours in the saddle

MEN'S PRO LEVITATE
WOMEN'S PRO LEVITATE

ELITE Levitate

THE PERFECT BLEND OF COMFORT AND SUPPORT

ELITE Levitate

With a ride quality similar to the PRO, this chamois pad delivers comfort and performance that‚Äôs on par or better than most high-end offerings.

‚Ä¢ PLUS Next-Gen Suspension Core¬Æ utilizes high-density and medium-density to distribute your body weight over a larger area for more comfort

‚Ä¢ Designed as a daily driver chamois capable of enduring long distances

MEN'S ELITE LEVITATE
WOMEN'S ELITE LEVITATE

SELECT Levitate

BEST-IN-CLASS PERFORMANCE AT AN ACCESSIBLE PRICE

SELECT Levitate

Based on the same design philosophy as the more premium PRO and PLUS, this chamois pad delivers incredible performance at a more accessible price point.

‚Ä¢ Cut from a single layer of medium-density material, with a thicker cross-section providing comfortable support to the most high-pressure areas

‚Ä¢ Offers performance comparable to mid-range offerings

Title: Ride 365 - Wet Weather
Body HTML:
RIDE 365¬Æ CLIMATE SYSTEM:

WET WEATHER.

Our wet weather system helps to ensure rain never dampens your ride. Utilizing cutting-edge technology, our rain layers are breathable, packable, water repellent and waterproof so you can find enjoyment, even on the wettest days.

RIDE 365¬Æ CLIMATE SYSTEM:

WET WEATHER.

Our wet weather system helps to ensure rain never dampens your ride. Utilizing cutting-edge technology, our rain layers are breathable, packable, water repellent and waterproof so you can find enjoyment, even on the wettest days.

YOUR GUIDE TO WET WEATHER DRESSING.

When humid, damp, or wet conditions are looming, staying dry is a priority. Start with a seasonal-appropriate kit, ensuring to pick the proper base layers when temperatures start to drop. If it‚Äôs drizzling or not yet raining, opt for a lightweight, quick-drying layer that you can easily store. For heavier rain, choose a high-quality jacket, like one from our WxB¬Æ collection.

SHOP MEN
SHOP WOMEN

YOUR GUIDE TO WET WEATHER DRESSING.

When humid, damp, or wet conditions are looming, staying dry is a priority. Start with a seasonal-appropriate kit, ensuring to pick the proper base layers when temperatures start to drop. If it‚Äôs drizzling or not yet raining, opt for a lightweight, quick-drying layer that you can easily store. For heavier rain, choose a high-quality jacket, like one from our WxB¬Æ collection.

SHOP MEN
SHOP WOMEN

WEATHER PROTECTION

CREATE A BARRIER BETWEEN YOU AND THE RAIN.

RIDE LIKE YOU

MEAN IT.

Our wet weather system includes barrier fabrics that act as a shield between you and the rain. These fabrics are breathable, helping regulate your internal temperature, and use durable water repellent (DWR) technology to shed water droplets and dry quickly.

SHOP JACKETS

WEATHER PROTECTION

RIDE LIKE YOU MEAN IT.

CREATE A BARRIER BETWEEN YOU AND THE RAIN.

Our wet weather system includes barrier fabrics that act as a shield between you and the rain. These fabrics are breathable, helping regulate your internal temperature, and use durable water repellent (DWR) technology to shed water droplets and dry quickly.

SHOP JACKETS

TECHNICAL INNOVATION

WXB¬Æ: YOUR WET-WEATHER SECRET WEAPON.

ELEVATED COMFORT. ELEVATED PERFORMANCE.

WxB¬Æ fabrics offer waterproof protection from the elements. Taped seams act as a watertight seal, and breathable fabrics are combined with DWR technology to help repel rain. The result is an ultra-strong membrane that keeps you from getting soggy.

SHOP WXB¬Æ

ELEVATED COMFORT. ELEVATED PERFORMANCE.

WXB¬Æ: YOUR WET-WEATHER SECRET WEAPON.

WxB¬Æ fabrics offer waterproof protection from the elements. Taped seams act as a watertight seal, and breathable fabrics are combined with DWR technology to help repel rain. The result is an ultra-strong membrane that keeps you from getting soggy.

SHOP WXB¬Æ

STAY-DRY LAYERS

PI DRY¬Æ MAINTAINS COMFORT AT EVERY LEVEL.

PI Dry¬Æ reinforces our knit and woven fabrics with water-repellent properties at the fiber level. This technology stays dry and lightweight even when faced with snow and rain, and it‚Äôs highly durable‚Äîlasting over 100 washes in our tests.

Title: Employee Privacy Policy
Body HTML:
Effective date:¬†9.10.2024

1.¬†¬†¬†¬† Overview

This Employee and Contractor Privacy Policy (the ‚ÄúPrivacy Policy‚Äù) contains the policies and procedures to be followed by United Sports Brands and its affiliates and subsidiaries, including its present or future subsidiaries (the ‚ÄúCompany,‚Äù ‚ÄúUnited Sports Brands,‚Äù ‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúus,‚Äù or ‚Äúour‚Äù) related¬† to the collection and use of personal information of an applicant, an employee (‚ÄúEmployee‚Äù), a Company officer or director, or a contractor in the United States, (collectively referred to this in Privacy Policy as the ‚ÄúEmployee/Contractor,‚Äù ‚Äúyou,‚Äù or ‚Äúyour‚Äù).¬† Note: A ‚ÄúContractor‚Äù is a non-employee who performs services for United Sports Brands and is not employed by the Company.¬† Certain sections of this Privacy Policy do not apply to Contractors.¬† Nothing in this Privacy Policy shall create an employment relationship between Company and Contractors.

United Sports Brands wants you to understand how and why we collect ‚ÄúPersonal Information,‚Äù which includes any information that identifies, relates to, describes, is reasonably capable of being associated with, or could reasonably be linked, directly or indirectly, with a particular Employee/Contractor.¬†

United Sports Brands is committed to protecting the privacy of all of our Employees/Contractors, and we take administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your Personal Information from unauthorized access, misuse, accidental loss, or alteration.¬† However, Employees/Contractors should have no expectation of privacy when using technology provided by United Sports Brands or whenever accessing United Sports Brands‚Äô technology resources, networks, or information.

If you are a resident of California, please see the attached California Privacy Notice Addendum for a full list of the disclosures and rights available to you under California law.¬†

2.¬†¬†¬†¬† Notice of Employee Monitoring

We may monitor telephonic and electronic conversations or transmissions, including e-mail and internet access, by Employees/Contractors conducted using our systems or devices.¬† This includes use of systems, networks, computers, telephones, and other devices provided or maintained by the Company or by our service providers.¬† We may monitor these networks, devices, and services to ensure their safety, security, and efficiency, to confirm compliance with our policies and procedures, and to permit internal evaluations.

3.¬†¬†¬†¬† What Information Do We Collect?

The following chart explains the categories of Personal Information that we may collect or process and the specific reasons for which we process each category of information. ¬†For more detailed information regarding why we process each category of information, please see the ‚ÄúPurposes of Collection‚Äù section below.

¬†

Please note that we may not collect all categories of Personal Information about each Employee/Contractor.¬† For example, if the collection of Personal Information relates to a specific benefit that is not generally available, we would only collect that Personal Information from the Employees/Contractors who are eligible for and enroll in the benefit.¬† Additionally, when we collect a category of Personal Information, we may not collect each specific example listed. Some of these categories may overlap with other categories.

Category

Examples

Purposes for Collection

A.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† ¬†Identifiers

A real name, alias, postal address, unique personal identifier, online identifier, Internet Protocol address, email address, account name, Social Security number, driver‚Äôs license number, passport number, or other similar identifiers

A name, signature, Social Security number, physical characteristics or description, address, telephone number, passport number, driver‚Äôs license or state identification card number, insurance policy number, education, employment, employment history, bank account number, credit card number, debit card number, or any other financial information, medical information, or health insurance information

Age (40 years or older), race, color, ancestry, national origin, citizenship, religion or creed, marital status, medical condition, physical or mental disability, sex (including gender, gender identity, gender expression, pregnancy or childbirth and related medical conditions), sexual orientation, veteran or military status, genetic information (including familial genetic information)

¬†

Genetic, physiological, behavioral, and biological characteristics, or activity patterns used to extract a template or other identifier or identifying information, such as, fingerprints, faceprints, and voiceprints, iris or retina scans, keystroke, gait, or other physical patterns, and sleep, health, or exercise data

L.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† ¬†Sensitive Personal Information

Personal Information that reveals (a) Social Security, driver‚Äôs license, state identification card, or passport number; (b) account log-in, financial account, debit card, or credit card number in combination with any required security or access code, password, or credential allowing access to an account; (c) precise geolocation; (d) racial or ethnic origin, religious, or philosophical beliefs, or union membership; (e) political opinions; or (f) the contents of a consumer‚Äôs mail, email, and text messages unless the business is the intended recipient of the communication

Biometric information processed for the purpose of uniquely identifying a consumer, Personal Information collected and analyzed concerning a consumer‚Äôs health, sex life, or sexual orientation.

Some Sensitive Personal Information included in this category may overlap with other categories

Facilitate Communications and Efficiency

Provide Benefits

¬†

4.¬†¬†¬†¬† Purposes of Collection

a.¬†¬†¬†¬† Administering the Employment/Contractor Relationship

We keep and process Personal Information for traditional employment and contractor engagement purposes.¬† We use this information for management and administrative uses and only disclose it with others who have a need-to-know such information.¬† We keep and use it to enable us to run the business and manage our relationship with you effectively, lawfully and appropriately, during the recruitment process, while you are working for us, and after your employment or contract has ended.¬† This includes using Personal Information to enable us to comply with any legal requirements associated with an employee or contractor relationship, to administer payroll, to provide you with benefits, ensure your safety, comply with an employment or service contract, and to demonstrate our commitment to equal employment opportunity and fair employment practices.¬†

b.¬†¬†¬†¬† Compliance with Legal Obligations

In certain situations, we may need to collect and process your Personal Information to comply with our legal obligations.¬† This may include:

  • Tracking demographic information to confirm compliance with equal opportunity and non-discrimination policies and requirements;
  • Processing information relating to your health, which could include reasons for absence and doctor‚Äôs reports and notes, in order to comply with our obligations under applicable employment and safety and health laws;
  • Processing information regarding certifications and qualifications for your role or position;
  • Processing information regarding participation in employment related activities about which we are required to retain a record; and/or
  • Processing information relevant to any alleged violations of the Company‚Äôs code of conduct (or comparable Company policy) or other Company policies necessary to investigate allegations and institute disciplinary action as is required.

c.¬†¬†¬†¬† Facilitate Communications and Efficiency

The Company uses various tools and platforms that allow Employees/Contractors to more easily communicate with each other and to more efficiently access and disclose various types of work product and schedules.¬† Some tools may also allow Employees/Contractors to disclose information via social media or other channels, including information relating to job opportunities.

These tools and platforms may collect and disclose contact information and Company profile pictures; log certain preferences and actions; collect your geolocation; and create user profiles that allow Employees and the Company to track their efficiency and performance.¬† We may also have access to communications sent using Company systems and devices.

d.¬†¬†¬†¬† Provide Benefits

We offer Employees a variety of benefits, including benefits related to healthcare, retirement savings, and the ability to order goods and services directly from the Company.¬† If Employees take advantage of other benefits, such as fitness-related benefits, we may also collect additional biometric and sensory information.¬† When you participate in certain benefits programs, we may also generate a log of your activity, track internet and other network activity, and develop a user profile to provide those programs to you in a manner tailored to your preferences.

All benefits may not be available to all Employees, and the Company will only collect Personal Information to provide a benefit if the Employee is eligible for and enrolled in that benefit.¬† Employees should take care to read the specific terms applicable to any particular mobile application or benefits program to understand the specific pieces of information collected.¬† Employees should also review all applicable privacy notices from benefits providers.

e.¬†¬†¬†¬† Ensure the Safety of Employees, Contractors, Facilities, and Property

We collect various categories of information to ensure the safety of Employees/Contractors, facilities and property.¬† This information helps verify the identity of Employees/Contractors in specific facilities and ensure the security of facilities and Company vehicles.¬† Additionally, we may process certain categories of Personal Information to ensure the safety and security of our electronic systems and devices.¬† This includes monitoring our systems for suspicious or fraudulent activity and other forms of illegal conduct.¬† This monitoring is critical to ensure the safety and security of our systems and the confidential information that is entrusted to us.

5.¬†¬†¬†¬† Disposal of Personal Information

We take appropriate measures to ensure that your Personal Information is processed and disposed of in a manner that maintains its confidentiality.¬† All Personal Information disposal procedures, including the disposal of computerized data storage devices, are designed to ensure the complete destruction of Personal Information and eliminate the risk of subsequent unauthorized access or disclosure.

6.¬†¬†¬†¬† Updates to the Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy is subject to occasional revision, and if we make any material changes in the categories of information we collect or the reasons we collect that information, we will notify you by sending you an e-mail and/or by prominently posting notice of the changes.¬† This Privacy Policy will also be posted to here.¬† You can review or consult the Privacy Policy at any time.¬†

The Company may be subject to certain laws and regulations relating to privacy and information security in more than one jurisdiction in which Employees/Contractors reside.¬†

If any term, covenant, condition, or provision of this Privacy Policy is held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, void, or unenforceable, it is the intent of this Privacy Policy that the scope of the rights and obligations of the Privacy Policy be reduced only for the affected jurisdiction and only to the extent deemed necessary under the laws of the local jurisdiction to render the provision reasonable and enforceable and the remainder of the provisions of the Privacy Policy statement will in no way be affected, impaired, or invalidated as a result.

7.¬†¬†¬†¬† Contact Us with Questions

If you have questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact info@shockdoctor.com.

¬†

California Privacy Notice Addendum

This California Privacy Notice Addendum (‚ÄúCalifornia Addendum‚Äù) applies to applicants, employees, and contractors that are residents of the state of California.¬† This California Addendum supplements our Employee and Contractor Privacy Policy (‚ÄúPrivacy Policy‚Äù).¬† Words reused in this California Addendum shall be interpreted as defined by the California Consumer Privacy Act, Cal. Civ. Code ¬ß 1798.100 et seq., as amended by the California Privacy Rights Act, and implementing regulations (collectively, the ‚ÄúCCPA‚Äù).¬†

¬†

This California Addendum will provide you with a summary of the categories of information we collect, the reasons that we collect each category of information, information regarding how we may disclose your Personal Information with third parties, and information regarding your rights under the CCPA¬†

1.¬†¬†¬†¬† Information We Collect and Sources of Personal Information

In the preceding 12 months, we have collected the categories of Personal Information identified above in the Employee and Contractor Privacy Policy.¬† We collect the majority of the information directly from you, through the applications or forms you submit and the information you provide at the time of hiring.¬† In addition to the information that you provide to us, we may collect information about you from third parties, such as information from third parties that provide accreditation, educational institutions, benefits providers, and vendors that provide background checks or related information.¬† Finally, we may automatically collect, store, or otherwise process information about you as you use our tools, systems, or resources, or when you are on-site at one of our locations.

2.¬†¬†¬†¬† How Your Personal Information Is Disclosed

In the preceding 12 months, we have disclosed the following categories of employment related information with service providers, who are necessary for facilitating the employment relationship and providing you with benefits:

    1. A (Identifiers), B (Personal), C (Classification), D (Commercial), F (Internet), I (Professional), L (Sensitive).

Where necessary, we enter into written contracts with our service providers to ensure the privacy and security of your Personal Information.¬† Under these contracts, we restrict the access to and processing of your Personal Information to that which is necessary for the purpose of the disclosure.

In certain circumstances, we may provide you with opportunities to sign up for certain benefits programs that involve the disclosure of your Personal Information to third party benefits providers.¬† Any such program will be purely optional and based on your opt-in participation.

In the preceding 12 months, we have not shared or sold employment-related Personal Information to third parties as those terms are defined by the CCPA.

We do not collect, process, or disclose sensitive Personal Information, as defined under the CCPA, for purposes other than those specified in Section 7027 of the CCPA regulations.

3.¬†¬†¬†¬† Individual Rights

The CCPA provides residents of California with a series of rights regarding the processing of their Personal Information. This section explains the scope of these rights and outlines how you may exercise them.

a.¬†¬†¬†¬† Right to Know About Personal Information Collected, Disclosed, Shared, or Sold

You have the right to know whether we are processing your Personal Information and to request that we disclose the Personal Information we collect, use, and disclose to third parties.¬† There are two types of Rights to Know requests that you can make: an Abbreviated Request and a Specific Information Request.

If you make a Right to Know (Abbreviated Request), you will receive the following information about you:

  1. Categories of Personal Information collected, sold, or shared;
  2. Categories of sources from which Personal Information is collected;
  3. Categories of third parties to whom the information is sold, shared or disclosed;
  4. Business or commercial purpose for collecting, sharing, or selling Personal Information;
  5. Categories of Personal Information disclosed for a business purpose and categories of persons to whom it was disclosed for a business purpose.

If you make a Right to Know (Specific Pieces of Information Request), you will receive the following information about you:

  1. Specific pieces of Personal Information collected about you.

We will provide this information to you free of charge, unless we determine that your request is manifestly unfounded or excessive.¬† You may request this information twice in a 12-month period.

We will provide this information to you in a portable, and to the extent technically feasible, readily usable format that allows you to transmit the data without hindrance.

There are certain exceptions to the Right to Know.¬† We will state in our response if an exception applies.

b.¬†¬†¬†¬† Right of Deletion

You have the right to request that we and our service providers delete personal that we have collected about you by submitting a verifiable request.¬† This right is subject to certain exceptions and does not require us to delete information that we are otherwise required to hold under applicable laws.¬† We will state in our response if an exception applies.

c.¬†¬†¬†¬† Right to Opt-Out of the Sale or Sharing of Personal Information

You have the right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of your Personal Information by a business subject to certain laws and regulations.¬† We do not sell or share information that we collect or process about you in your capacity as an Employee or Contractor.¬†

d.¬†¬†¬†¬† Right of Correction

You have the right to request that we correct inaccuracies in any Personal Information that we collect or process about you upon receipt of a verifiable request. When submitting a correction request, we request that you provide all of the information reasonably necessary to confirm that the accuracy of the correction request. This right is subject to certain exceptions. We will state in our response if an exception applies.

e.¬†¬†¬†¬† Right to Limit Use and Disclosure of Sensitive Personal Information

You have the right to request that we limit the use and disclosure of your Sensitive Personal Information to only those purposes specifically authorized under California law.¬† At this time, we do not process or disclose your Sensitive Personal Information for purposes that are not specifically authorized under California law.¬† Should this change, we will notify you and provide you with an opportunity to limit our processing of your Sensitive Personal Information.

f.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Right to Non-Discrimination

We will not retaliate against any employee, applicant for employment, or independent contractor for exercising your rights under the CCPA. Additionally, we will not discriminate against you by: denying goods or services to you; charging different prices or rates for benefits, goods, or services, including through the use of discounts or other benefits or imposing penalties; providing a different level of quality of goods or services to you; or suggesting that you will receive a different price or rate for goods or services or a different level or quality of goods or services.¬†

g.¬†¬†¬†¬† Submitting Requests

To submit a rights request, you may email us at info@shockdoctor.com or contact us by phone at 800-233-6956.

We will provide responses to your requests free of charge unless exclusions apply, which we will identify in our response.

h.¬†¬†¬†¬† Verifying Requests

To ensure the protection of your Personal Information, we must verify that the individual submitting a request to know, request to delete, or request to correct is the applicant, contractor, or employee to whom the request relates prior to processing the request.¬† To verify your identity, we may request up to three pieces of Personal Information about you to compare against our records.

You will not be required to create an account with us to submit a verifiable request.¬† However, you may be required to access an existing account to the extent accessing the account is necessary.

We will only use Personal Information provided in your request to verify your identity and will delete any information you provide after processing the request, unless otherwise prohibited from doing so under applicable law.¬† We reserve the right to take additional steps as necessary to verify your identity where we have reason to believe a request is fraudulent.

i.¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Authorized Agents

You may chose a person or business that you authorize to act on your behalf to submit your requests (‚ÄúAuthorized Agent‚Äù).¬† If you choose to use an Authorized Agent, we require that you provide the Authorized Agent with written permission to allow them to submit your request and that you verify your identity directly with us.¬† Failure to do so may result in us denying your request.

Title: Gift Cards
Body HTML:
PEARL iZUMi offers digital Gift Cards in amounts ranging from $25 to $300.¬†Purchase PEARL iZUMi Gift Cards here.

Gift Cards are typically emailed within hours to the email address used during the purchase of the Gift Card. Gift Cards do not expire. There are no fees associated with PEARL iZUMi Gift Cards.

No taxes are charged on the purchase of Gift Cards. Applicable taxes are charged when Gift Cares are redeemed.

Gift Cards do not count towards any free shipping purchase requirements. For example, if an order qualifies for free shipping with a $99 or more purchase, the Gift Card value does not apply to the $99 threshold.

Gift Cards are redeemable solely for purchases at PEARLiZUMi.com or PEARL iZUMi Outlet Stores. Lost or stolen Gift Cards will not be canceled and replaced without the required proof of purchase.¬†Gift Cards are not redeemable for cash.¬†Gift Cards cannot be redeemed on prior purchases or exchanges. Gift Cards are not returnable.

Gift Cards can only be used in the country where they were purchased and in the currency they were purchased. Gift Cards purchases on the United States site or at a PEARL iZUMi store located in the United States may only redeemed on the United States site or at a PEARL iZUMi store located in the United States.

If the value of your Gift Card is greater than the amount of your total purchase, you will be able to use the remaining Gift Card balance for future purchases, subject to these terms and conditions. If the value of your Gift Card is less than the amount of your total, you must use a credit card in order to complete your purchase.


To check your Gift Card balance, please call 800-328-8488. Make sure you have your card with you.

Title: Ride 365 - Cold Weather
Body HTML:
RIDE 365¬Æ CLIMATE SYSTEM:

COLD WEATHER.

Our cold weather system is designed to regulate your body temperature in variable conditions, from cool to cold to frigid. Our fabrics go beyond the industry standard to offer breathability and minimize bulk.

RIDE 365¬Æ CLIMATE SYSTEM:

COLD WEATHER.

Our cold weather system is designed to regulate your body temperature in variable conditions, from cool to cold to coldest. Our fabrics go beyond the industry standard to offer breathability and minimize bulk.

YOUR GUIDE TO COLD WEATHER DRESSING.

When you‚Äôre riding in cool and cold conditions, every layer has a purpose. As temperatures drop, you‚Äôll want to wear a quality base layer and thermal bibs that keep your skin dry. Our thermal jerseys act as an outer layer in cool conditions and a mid-weight layer in deep winter. Top it all off with a lightweight but insulated winter jacket, and accessorize with merino socks, season-appropriate gloves, and any other layers you may need.

SHOP MEN
SHOP WOMEN
